name: Eco Detectives
description: Put your detective cap on and help the Peril River with it's Problems. https://biomanbio.com/HTML5GamesandLabs/EcoGames/ecodetectiveshtml5page.html. To win the points write a new fact you learned about biodiverstiy.

name: Envirotmental Quiz
description: Test your skills by taking a knowledge quiz! https://www.earthday.org/environmental-literacy-quiz/. To win the points write the score you got!

name: Digital Environmental Cleanup Campaign
description: Organize an online campaign to raise awareness about environmental issues, encouraging people to participate in digital cleanups by sharing eco-friendly tips and solutions. To win the points make a poster on sustainability and using imgur send a link of the image here.

name: Wildlife Photography Challenge
description: When not online, go out and take a photo of 5 diffrent animials in your local area. To win the points using imgur send a link of the images here. Best ones will be reciving bonus points.

name: Virtual Nature Tour Guide
description: Find 3 local fauna or flora species in your area and present them to us on why it is the best species. To win the points using imgur send a link of the slideshow here. Most Convincing will be reciving bonus points.

name: Anti Poaching
description: Find an endagered and poached species and propose a way to stop the poaching.

name: Trail Cleanup Challenge (Real Life)
description: Walk a nearby trail for 15 minutes, picking up any trash along the way. Submit a photo of the collected trash.

name: Nature Journaling Break (Real Life)
description: Spend 15 minutes journaling about your outdoor experience. Include observations, thoughts, or sketches. Share a photo of your journal entry.
